entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY THIS MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS, MAINLY IN THE MORNING
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY IN THE EVENING, THEN SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
SOUTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY BE SEVERE
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY BE SEVERE
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS AROUND 70
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT
